ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Nirav Barot has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 15 years. Currently he is employed as a re-architect at MphasiS Corporation. Nirav has extensive knowledge of Java, Spring Framework, Hibernate, Win XP, JavaScript, Java 2 Enterprise Edition, JUnit, XML, JDBC, Google Web Toolkit, Rational ClearCase, Java Servlets, Apache Maven, Oracle, Log4j, IntelliJ IDEA, Ant, Struts Web Application Framework, Oracle PL/SQL, XSLT, ECLiPSe, Cascading Style Sheets, iReport 4.0, Web Services, UNIX, Jboss, C++, C Programming Language, WSS Financial Software, Spring RESTful Web Services, SDLC, Microsoft Visio, LEC, Internet, GXT, API. Nirav has some experience in managment (7 months).
ExperienceSummary.ManagementRecord: Since 2008-02 for 7 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Onsite Tech Lead/Availability checker at Patni Computer Systems.
